overview: Butlerâ€™s installations are dystopian dioramas, delivery bags and backpacks hanging open to reveal shining silver insulation and otherworldly scenarios. In one, a laptop plays an animated film called The Enthusiasts, depicting three-dimensional animated people fixated on laptops and iPads, playing digital employment simulators (landlord, police, shopkeep), oblivious as the room steadily floods.
title: The Enthusiasts
